query: ALTER TABLE spc_analysis_history ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS analyzed_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP; ALTER TABLE spc_analysis_history ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS production_line_id INT DEFAULT NULL; ALTER TABLE spc_analysis_history ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS violations TEXT DEFAULT NULL;
